canonical_text:
**Title:** DAO-002: Neutral Governance Adjustment

This proposal authorizes a limited update to defined DAO configuration parameters to align operations with current best practices, without altering ownership, token distribution, or core governance rights.[1][2]

claims.text: This proposal authorizes a limited update to defined DAO configuration parameters to align operations with current best practices, without altering ownership, token distribution, or core governance rights.[1][2]
